list.name: Default
list.comment: Updates to fix broken resurection of actors after introducing snapshotting

task.summary: Split of different input handling functions and renamed first to primary
Added test tu run kafka and added kafka streams to read messages from kafka as input
changed some events to case objects
Added filtering of outbound events so the EventRead is not published
Added twitter chill (kryo) for serialization and also custom serializer.
Updates to fix broken resurection of actors after introducing snapshotting

changed some events to case objects
Added filtering of outbound events so the EventRead is not published
Added twitter chill (kryo) for serialization and also custom serializer.
